## ActiveActionState interface

Tracks which action is currently active in the UI, optionally tied to a row.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ActiveActionState 
```

</td><td>

[type](./list-display.activeactionstate.type.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

</td><td>
